content: filet crochet leaf centerpiece skill beginner materials yarn butterfly super-10 cotton yarn model used approximately 1 6 oz 45g 90 yards of yarn hook f/5 crochet hook yarn darning needle size approximate dimensions 13 inches wide x 10 inches high gauge gauge is not important with this project common abbreviations and stitches used in this pattern chain chain double_crochet double_crochet special instructions & notes unless otherwise indicated work all stitches thru both loops definitions each open square = 1 double_crochet chain 2 each filled square = 3 double_crochet all row end with 1 double_crochet pattern chain 60 row 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook and in each chain across 58 double_crochet this includes the chain 3 at the beginning of the row row 2 19 continue by following chart page 1 of 2 copyright © 2010 mac s crafty creations all rights reserved this material in whole or in part may not be reprinted or distributed in any form or media without permission this pattern may not be used to produce items for sale or for other commercial purposes filet crochet leaf centerpiece page 2 of 2 copyright © 2010 mac s crafty creations all rights reserved this material in whole or in part may not be reprinted or distributed in any form or media without permission this pattern may not be used to produce items for sale or for other commercial purposes
